read.dbi.ffdf 1..1000 (1000)  dbi-read=72.26sec ffdf-write=0.02sec
read.dbi.ffdf 1001..2013938 (2012938)  dbi-read=6.22sec ffdf-write=0.1sec
read.dbi.ffdf 2013939..4026876 (2012938)  dbi-read=5.04sec ffdf-write=0.09sec

read.dbi.ffdf 8052753..10000000 (1947248)  dbi-read=4.9sec ffdf-write=0.11sec

> require(biglm)
> Sys.time() -> start
> model = biglm(Y ~ X1 + X2 + X3, fromPostgres_ff)
> print(Sys.time()-start)
Time difference of 41.56349 secs
> summary(model)
